You know what I don't like in a torrent that you did here? When video files and subtitle files are mixed together. You know what I DO like in a torrent that you DIDN'T do here? When the video files have one folder, and the subtitle files have their own separate folder.

I have found a solution for those who have limited bandwidth. If you have already downloaded this then you should know that the season3 works fine. And for the rest 2 seasons use mkvmerge. Now I know what's it used for but if you mux the files separately or with their .srt they work fine. For other like me who can't do the effort just download the
